mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.mesan_url AS "mesanUrl", a.is_createadmin AS "isCreateAdmin", a.evaluate_score AS "evaluateScore", t.status AS "approvalStatus", a.mesan_code as mesanCode, a.mesan_type as mesanType, tm.name as mesanTypeName, a.is_viewtop as isViewTop, a.swf_url as "swfUrl", c.count AS "count"

LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.create_by = u.id LEFT JOIN (select * from t_approval_record tt where tt.del_flag = 0) t on a.id = t.resource_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT mesan_id,COUNT(1) AS count FROM t_mesan_evaluate b WHERE b.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY b.mesan_id) c ON c.mesan_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_mesan_dir tm on tm.id = a.mesan_type
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u. NAME AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a. NAME AS "name", a.mesan_url AS "mesanUrl", a.is_createadmin AS "isCreateAdmin", t. STATUS AS "approvalStatus" FROM t_mesan_info a inner JOIN sys_user u ON a.create_by = u.id inner JOIN t_approval_record t on a.id = t.resource_id and t.del_flag = 0 WHERE t. STATUS = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 AND a.id NOT IN ( SELECT tr.id FROM t_distribu_temp t INNER JOIN t_mesan_info tr ON t.ref_id = tr.id WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND t.activity_dir_id = #{activityDirId} AND t.activity_id = #{activityId} )
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mesan_info( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, name, is_createadmin, mesan_url, swf_url, mesan_type, mesan_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{isCreateAdmin}, #{mesanUrl}, #{swfUrl}, #{mesanType}, #{mesanCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mesan_info SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, name = #{name}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, mesan_url = #{mesanUrl}, swf_url = #{swfUrl}, evaluate_score = #{evaluateScore}, mesan_type = #{mesanType}, mesan_code = #{mesanCode} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select su.`name` ,so.name as officeName from ( ( SELECT DISTINCT tc.user_id FROM t_lessson_time t INNER JOIN t_lessson_dir td ON t.id = td.lesson_time_id INNER JOIN t_activity_dir ta ON ta.id = td.activity_dir_id INNER JOIN t_distribu_temp tt ON tt.activity_dir_id = ta.id and tt.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN t_study_record tc ON tt.ref_id = tc.resource_id where t.id = #{lessionTimeId} and tc.activity_id = #{userActivityId} )UNION ALL( select user_id from t_lession_importuser where active_id = #{userActivityId}
) )tu inner join sys_user su on tu.user_id = su.id left join sys_office so on su.office_id = so.id

SELECT t.id, t.name as name, tur.browseTime FROM t_mesan_info t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tur.mesan_id, sum( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( str_to_date(tur.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( str_to_date( tur.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) ) ) AS browseTime FROM t_user_study_record_material tur where tur.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY tur.mesan_id ) tur on t.id = tur.mesan_id
AND t.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND tur.browseTime >0
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY browseTime DESC
